con:restRequest.name: AddMarketingEvent
con:restRequest.con:request: { "MarketingEventChannels": [ { "MarketingEventChannelId": "bce4fc4f-1b7d-2d49-b498-cea4e90a6105", "ChannelName": "No Channel", "ChannelCode": "NO_CHANNEL" } ], "MarketingEventOfferTags": [], "EventName": "${AIQOffers#OfferName}", "EventCode": "${AIQOffers#OfferCode}", "ProgramCode": "AIQ", "PackagedAudience": { "PackagedAudienceId": "7ae1f987-515e-4669-e053-5ca8e70ad3ee", "MarketingEventId": "86304ef9-3948-4287-8858-b8268bd1a4a1", "AudienceName": "All Members", "AudienceDescription": "All enrolled members with an active profile status", "HarmonyTemplate": { "type": "AND", "groupType": "GROUP", "conditions": [ { "type": "AND", "groupType": "GROUP", "conditions": [ { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "PROGRAMCODE", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~PROGRAMCODE~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "{{PROGRAMCODE}}" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false }, { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "ENROLLMENTSTATUS", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~ENROLLMENTSTATUS~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "A" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false } ] }, { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "PROFILESTATUS", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~PROFILESTATUS~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "A" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false } ] }, "PackagedAudienceParams": [ { "MarketingEventId": "86304ef9-3948-4287-8858-b8268bd1a4a1", "PackagedAudienceParamId": "f0a885b4-b773-5c52-e053-5dedef0a74de", "PackagedAudienceId": "7ae1f987-515e-4669-e053-5ca8e70ad3ee", "ParamName": "All Members", "ParamCode": "ALLMEMBERS_AUDIPRAM", "ParamDescription": "All Members", "DataType": "Label", "ParamControl": "Label", "IsRequired": false } ], "AudienceMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "PurchaseTxn.Enrollment.MemberStatus == \\\"A\\\"", "SurveyMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "ProfileSurveyResponse.Enrollment.MemberStatus == \\\"A\\\"" }, "AudienceSource": "PACKAGED_AUDIENCE", "PackagedOffer": { "PackagedOfferId": "1d5c8eb6-abb9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "MarketingEventId": "86304ef9-3948-4287-8858-b8268bd1a4a1", "PackagedOfferCode": "CUSTOM_OFFER", "PackagedOfferName": "Custom Offer", "PackagedOfferDescription": "Start from scratch and create your own offer", "OfferMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "{{EVENTTYPE}}.Offers.OfferCode == \\\"{{OFFERCODEOFFERNAME}}\\\"", "PackagedOfferParams": [ { "MarketingEventId": "86304ef9-3948-4287-8858-b8268bd1a4a1", "PackagedOfferParamId": "1d5c8eb6-b1b9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "PackagedOfferId": "1d5c8eb6-abb9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "ParamName": "Purchase", "ParamCode": "CUSTOM_PRODUCT", "DataType": "custom", "ParamControl": "product", "IsRequired": true, "Value": "ItemNumber in (\"${AIQOffers#SKU}\", \"${AIQOffers#SKU1}\")", "ParamCustomValue": { "ProductLevelList": [], "ProductCode": [ "${AIQOffers#SKU}\", \"${AIQOffers#SKU1}" ], "DisplayProductCode": [], "ProductSelectType": 1, }, "PanelId": "e0e698ac-4191-d25d-e053-5dedef0ac6ef", "PanelCode": "CUSTOMER_ACTIVITY", "OfferParamCategoryCode": "TRANSACTIONAL", "MarketingCusOfferMomentPartId": "8e9031b7-5359-b662-e053-5dedef0a7022", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDateTime", "OutcomeEquationUi": "round({{CUSTOM_POINT_AMT_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}} * sumQualifiedItems(PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue))", "CalculationTemplate": "round(<VariableFactor,[Number]> * sumQualifiedItems(<DollarValueGross,[Number]>))", "FormulaName": "SUM_QUALIFIED_ITEMS", "RuleEquationUi": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue >= 0 && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.{{CUSTOM_PRODUCT}}", "OfferParamCategoryName": "Transactional", "DisplayParamName": "Purchase a product" }, { "MarketingEventId": "86304ef9-3948-4287-8858-b8268bd1a4a1", "PackagedOfferParamId": "1d5c8eb6-b8b9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "PackagedOfferId": "1d5c8eb6-abb9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "ParamName": "Point amount", "ParamCode": "CUSTOM_POINT_AMT_REWARDED", "ParamDescription": "0", "DataType": "input", "ParamControl": "number", "IsRequired": true, "Value": "100", "PanelId": "e0e698ac-4291-d25d-e053-5dedef0ac6ef", "PanelCode": "CUSTOMER_REWARD", "MarketingCusOfferMomentPartId": "8e9031b7-5759-b662-e053-5dedef0a7022", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "OutcomeEquationUi": "{{CUSTOM_POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}", "CalculationTemplate": "<fixedpoints,[Number]>", "FormulaName": "FIXEDAMT", "DisplayParamName": "Fixed point amount" } ], "PackagedOfferCategoryId": "ff2dcceb-cc72-9f45-abfa-eee67daafdf0", "PackagedOfferCategoryCode": "CUSTOM_OFFER", "CustomOfferActivityValue": { "Type": "ATTRIBUTE", "PackagedOfferParamId": "1d5c8eb6-b1b9-ed4e-e053-5dedef0ac6ca", "Value": "ItemNumber in (\"${AIQOffers#SKU}\", \"${AIQOffers#SKU1}\")" } }, "OfferStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").format(new Date())}", "OfferEndDate":"${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'23:59:59.999").format(new Date()+365)}", "OptInStatus": false, "AddOnlineMessageToEmail": false, "IsAudienceCountCompleted": false, "IsOfferSimulationCompleted": false, "BusinessUnitTimeZone": "UTC", "Status": "A" }
